description.value:
Level: 10
Category: Other
Time: 15 minutes
Component Cost: 200 gp
Market Price: 800 gp
Key Skill: Heal or Nature (no check)

This perfume is made from the rare grayflower, known to grow only in Q'barra's swamps. The grayflower's faint scent is enough to confound even the sharpest sense of smell.

Grayflower Perfume
Level 10 Uncommon

You spray the perfume into the air and for a moment, the blind creature can't locate you.

Price: 200 gp
Alchemical Item

Power (Consumable): Minor Action. You are invisible to creatures that see using blindsight until the start of your next turn.

Published in Eberron Player's Guide, page(s) 100.
